titleStmt.title: The religion of the hypocritical presbyterians, in meeter
titleStmt.author: Phillips, John, 1631-1706.

notesStmt.note: "An attack on Oliver Cromwell and puritanism by John Phillips, nephew of Milton, originally published in 1655, and later published with title A satyre against hypocrites"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Caption title: The religion of the hypocritical Presbyterian.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
